thread.section_title: Hotel Le Marquis - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful hotel in the heart of Paris!
thread.title_full: Wonderful hotel in the heart of Paris! - Review of Hotel Le Marquis, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: mellischoebel
title: Wonderful hotel in the heart of Paris!
text: Le Marquis is a perfect place for your business and pleasure stay in Paris. Close to the Eiffel tower, you are in the middle of the city. The staff in the Marquis is extremely helpful, speaks lots of languages and are the most friendly people you can imagine. Le Marquis made it to my most favorite hotel in Paris!
